channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Devil May Cry: Devil Trigger Collection
item.content:encoded: Unleash your inner demon slayer with the Devil May Cry: Devil Trigger Collection! Dive into the fast-paced, over-the-top action of Capcom’s iconic Devil May Cry franchise—known for its slick combos, stylish weapons, and devilishly hunky leading men. Take on hordes of demons and towering bosses as Dante or Nero in DMC 1–5, including all additional content and DLC. Whether you're a longtime fan or a newcomer, this enhanced collection is the ultimate way to experience the chaos. Pay what you want and help support Breakthrough T1D with your purchase!

item.title: Gear Up For Borderlands 4: Borderlands X Wonderlands Bundle
item.content:encoded: Jump into the chaotic world of Pandora with the Borderlands & Tiny Tina Bundle from Gearbox Software—one of the most stylish franchises in gaming history. A pioneer of the looter-shooter genre, the Borderlands series perfected the weapon-grind loop with addicting gunplay and over-the-top rewards—aka bigger, badder, crazier guns. Pay what you want and unlock Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Chaotic Great Edition, Borderlands 1–3, New Tales from the Borderlands, and more. Get the ultimate Borderlands experience—and help support Covenant House with your purchase! Plus, get ready Borderlands 4 coming out on September 12th.

item.title: Humblecraft: RTS Rush
item.content:encoded: Feel the rush of real-time strategy with this outstanding bundle of top-tier indie RTS titles! Build and command voxel-powered vehicles across sea and space in From the Depths. Defend your stronghold in classic medieval warfare with Stronghold: Definitive Edition. Engage in Cold War-era combat with intense 1v1 and 8v8 battles in Men of War: Assault Squad 2—and more. Challenge your tactical skills with great games and help support Xperience Studios with your purchase!

item.title: Summer Games Done Quick 2025
item.content:encoded: Help support the annual Summer Games Done Quick live-stream event with our latest collaborative bundle with GamesDoneQuick! Add a collection of fun, fast-paced games tied to the speedrunning community to your library—and feel good doing it. Plus, a portion of your purchase goes directly to Doctors Without Borders. Try your hand at speedrunning with competitive and entertaining titles like Finding Frankie, Code Bunny, Catlateral Damage: Remeowstered, and more.

item.title: Upload VR Summer 2025
item.description: Dive into a new reality with VR
item.content:encoded: Pay what you want to start your VR gaming journey with our latest bundle of immersive titles! Step into the boots of a master swordsman and experience intense, physics-based combat in Until You Fall. Then dive into the mind-bending world of Vertigo 2 as you uncover the mysteries of a quantum reactor teeming with aliens, rogue robots, and deadly fauna. Play these standout VR games and more—plus, a portion of your purchase helps support the mental health advocates at Safe In Our World.
